desc: Users can search for music and play a 30 second sample. Data is retrieved from the iTunes API.
Users have the option of searching by artist. Clicking on an artist runs another search for that artist's name.
Users can also refine their search by album. Clicking on an album will run another search for songs from that album.
Features both a light and dark mode, with similar hover effects, so the user can tailor the site to their liking.
